results.title: Effect of Metformin on the Functional and Electrophysiological Recovery of Crush Injury-Induced Facial Nerve Paralysis in Diabetic Rats
results.text_hl: The short-term effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on the recovery of @<m>DISEASE_Facial_Nerve_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005155 @@@facial nerve@@@ blood flow (FNBF) was significantly increased compared to the DM/PBS group.
